lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Daniel Lee, an analyst at Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc, said that although Sosnoff's relatively low bid may attract other suitors willing to pay a higher price for Caesars, there is little likelihood that a competing bid would start a battle for the company.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: A Caesars World spokesman said the company was declining comment on the Sosnoff move for the moment, but Caesars may issue a public statement after it has studied the offer.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: MTS, a company formed by Martin Sosnoff, Caesars World's largest shareholder, today began a tender offer, valued at 725.2 mln dlrs, for all shares Sosnoff doesn't already own.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Daniel Lee, an analyst at Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc, said that although Sosnoff's relatively low bid may attract other suitors willing to pay a higher price for Caesars, there is little likelihood that a competing bid would start a battle for the company.

lst.name: sentence

lst.name: sentence
